attributes.action: Change how people are treated with FND and non epileptic seizures
attributes.additional_details: For more awareness to be given to ambulance crews and hospital staff as people with non epileptic seizures can become dangerous and can turned into epileptic seizures. I’ve been treated unfairly by ambulance crew and hospital staff. I want them to treat us fairly like they would with others and treat us nicely.
attributes.background: I want change to happen as more people are being diagnosed with non epileptic seizures and FND and are being treated like we are doing this for attention when we have no control over them.Also ambulance crews treat people differently like shouting at us, coming across in a aggressive manner to us.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612385
